title: Eli Manning, Browns, Steelers, and the Herd Hierarchy
itunes:title: Eli Manning, Browns, Steelers, and the Herd Hierarchy
description:
Colin approves of the New York Giants finally benching QB Eli Manning, why he's not impressed with the Cleveland Browns so far this season, why he has new hope for the Pittsburgh Steelers going forward, and his new Herd Hierarchy. Guests include Hue Jackson, Peter King, Russell Wilson, Peter King, and Joel Klatt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
